Identification.ShortTitle: Minister Designation Order (Precious Metals Marking Act)
Identification.LongTitle: Order Designating the Minister for the Purposes of the Precious Metals Marking Act

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Minister Designation Order (Precious Metals Marking Act).
The Minister of Consumer and Corporate Affairs, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, is hereby designated as the Minister for the purposes of the Precious Metals Marking Act.
